title: WETLAND VOL3:A RAINY DAY
description: 5 Super Realistic WetLand Materials for all platforms. All Textures have their own 8K, 4K, 2K, and 1K versions.
longDescription:
--------------------------------------------EPIC MEGAGRANT PROJECT---------------------------------------------------

Hi there, thank you for reviewing my product. This is a special concept deals with wet grounds. I want to give you some idea where you can prefer to use this concept.


It is mostly suitable for use in such situations.

  • A rain scene/generally after rain
  • a stony scene wet scene--near river waterfall sea or ocean
  • A forest scene
  • You are building a river and small puddles formed around the river.
  • In a swampy or mostly mudy area
  • And in similar external environment designs.

Some important detail---------

All images are in .tga file format and not compressed. As you know, tga is the best image format.I also add 32-bit .EXR Displacement alpha true for making your job more flexible.

also I look forward to your feedback and advice. Thank you, for any problems, help, or suggestions, mail me at conceptaart@gmail.com

------CAA ALL PRODUCTS------
technicalDetails:
• Designed for all platforms. Pack includes 1K, 2K, 4K, & 8K Texture versions so you can use it on every platform, (only 4.24 or newer supports all platforms including mobile. 4.22 and 4.23 versions only tested in Windows and does not support mobile.)
  • Unique Concept
  • Real world based
  • Power of 8K
  • ALL TEXTURES ARE TARGA FILE FORMAT .TGA-uncompressed
  • 32-bit .EXR Displacement alpha true (pack include both tga and exr displacement files for all resolutions.)
  • Over 20 parameters for adjustments.
  • 30 8K Textures, 30 4K Textures, 30 2K Textures, and 30 1K Textures. Plus 20 .EXR Displacemet files.
  • Materials and Material Instances: 5 Master 10 Instances

Number of Textures: 140

  • 30 8K Textures (8196x8196), 30 4K Textures (4096x4096), 30 2K Textures (2048x2048), 30 1K Textures (1024x1024) +20 Displacement32Bit for each pack and each version.[every pack has 4 extra displacement32bit.exr ( 1k,2k,4k adn 8k)]

Supported Development Platforms:

  • 4.24 or newer version supports all platforms (tested on mobile and Windows). 4.22 and 4.23 versions only tested on Windows and does not support mobile.
  • Windows and Mac: Yes

Doc: Not finished yet(ask for documentation with mail after they are complete I will add them)
